name: ReBoot
description: The game combines modern 3D-graphics and old school gameplay.Forget about peaceful aiming and a sense of superiority over your enemies.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: Dual Core processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Compatible with DirectX11 with 1024 MB RAM or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: Dual Core processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Compatible with DirectX11 with 1024 MB RAM or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
